p.k: 'Jazz Icons: Quincy Jones' spotlights a young 'Q' conducting his 'dream band'—an 18-piece orchestra of world-renowned players such as Clark Terry, Phil Woods, Sahib Shihab, Budd Johnson and Benny Bailey.
p.d: 'Jazz Icons: Quincy Jones' spotlights a young 'Q' conducting his 'dream band'—an 18-piece orchestra of world-renowned players such as Clark Terry, Phil Woods, Sahib Shihab, Budd Johnson and Benny Bailey. This recording features 5 songs and is one of the finest examples of big band jazz ever to be captured on film. Shot in Belgium in 1961, this concert is one of the only known visual documents of this legendary tour.
